Control Name: Processes Inputs—Inputs are processed completely, accurately, and timely as authorized in accordance with defined processing activities.

control_attributes.Control: Processes Inputs—Inputs are processed completely, accurately, and timely as authorized in accordance with defined processing activities.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.3 The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity’s objectives.
